messages.content: High-angle top-down view of a dimly lit abandoned courtyard, cracked concrete ground, scattered old markings and faded impact dents, long eerie character shadows cast off-frame, no violence depicted, dark Teal palette with a strong golden beam, thick outlines, 2D animated cartoon look, flat shading, extreme contrast, atmospheric tension.

usage_example.python:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI()

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="gpt-4o",
    max_tokens=4096,
    messages=[
        {"role": "system", "content": """High-angle top-down view of a dimly lit abandoned courtyard, cracked concrete ground, scattered old ..."""},
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(response.choices[0].message.content)
